meanings.definition: A two-wheeled vehicle propelled by human power.
meanings.sent1: Children rode their velocipedes in the park.
meanings.sent2: My friend enjoys riding his velocipede to work every day.
meanings.sent3: The velocipedes had a race, but one fell over comically.
meanings.sent4: In the city, velocipedes weave through traffic like skilled dancers.
meanings.sent5: The shiny velocipedes gleamed in the sunlight, attracting attention.

meanings.sent1: She learned to ride a velocipede when she was young.
meanings.sent2: The shop sells various types of velocipedes for different ages.
meanings.sent3: The velocipedes parked outside the school looked like a colorful fleet.
meanings.sent4: His old velocipede was a faithful companion on many adventures.
meanings.sent5: The sound of bells ringing from the velocipedes filled the street with joy.
